description: From Hindi गेंदख़ाना (gendxānā) / Urdu گیند خانہ‎ (gendxānā, “racquet court”), from गेंद (gend) / گیند‎ (gend, “ball”) + ख़ाना (xānā) / خانا‎ (xānā, “court”). Influenced by gymnastics and gymnasium.

entries.meaning: (equestrianism) A competition where riders and horses display a range of skills and aptitudes.
(India, Myanmar, dated) A place of public resort for athletic games, etc.
(India, Myanmar, dated) A meeting for such sports.
